title: Sample Book, "Environment 15", 1966
medium: Screen printed on muslin tapestry and paper
creditline: Gift of The Jack Denst Designs, Inc.
description: Small scale representations of designs to be printed as large scale murals: overscale weeds, geometricized flowers, building facades, sun face, Oriental carpet, letter forms, linear composition suggesting landscape, eagle, playing cards, trees, 1920s fashion models, antique automobiles. The titles include: "Ode to a Wild Carrot", "Memento of a Summer Past", "Around the Corner on 8th Street", "Hyperion", "Abracadabra", "Writing on the Wall", "A Gentle Pleasure-Roaming in Indiana", "Nighthawk", "Mississippi", "Beyond the Path-You Can See the Sky", "Age of Innocence", and "Memorabilia".

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, "Environment 15", 1966.
1966. Screen printed on muslin tapestry and paper. Gift of The Jack Denst Designs, Inc.. 1969-95-1-1/52.
